code: @Test public void testXsltWithError() throws Exception {     context.addRoutes(new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to("xslt:org/apache/camel/component/xslt/transform-with-error.xsl").         }     }).     try {         context.start().         fail("Should have thrown exception").     } catch (FailedToCreateRouteException e) {         TransformerConfigurationException cause = ObjectHelper.getException(TransformerConfigurationException.class, e).         assertNotNull(cause).         // not sure if XSLT errors may be i18n and not english always so just check for the spelling mistake of select -> slect         assertTrue(cause.getMessage().contains("slect")).     } }
